charinfo.name: Tsunade (S)
charinfo.description: No longer just a Sannin, Tsunade is the new Kage of Konoha, and has taken a large amount of responsibility on her shoulders. Knowing that holding back is no longer an option, Tsunade taps into her seal to gain an impressive power over her foes.

abilities.name: Heavenly Spear Kick
abilities.description: Tsunade spears one enemy with her foot, dealing 20 piercing damage to them. If an ally is being healed by 'Enhanced Healing Wave', they will also be unable to be killed for 1 turn. While improved, this skill will deal 40 piercing damage, and will destroy destructible defense.

abilities.name: Enhanced Healing Wave
abilities.description: Tsunade pours chakra into one ally, healing them for 30 health. Additionally, that character will heal an additional 10 health for 2 turns. If empowered, this skill will heal 40 health and the secondary effect will last an additional 1 turn.

abilities.name: Tsunade: Strength of a Hundred Seal
abilities.description: Tsunade taps into her seal, healing 25 health. The next time Tsunade uses a skill, it will be empowered. If this skill is used while empowered, it will heal Tsunade 50 health and grant her 2 random chakra.

abilities.name: Tsunade Protection
abilities.description: This skill makes Tsunade invulnerable for 1 turn. If empowered, this skill will make Tsunade's entire team invulnerable for 1 turn.
